participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Friendly and creative, always eager to try new things and share experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers. wedding cakes are my specialty. My panda mug is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of my favorite animal. i am the oldest of three boys. I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Curious and adventurous, with a strong interest in health and fitness, always looking to explore the world around him.
participant_2.background: I collect rare and unusual medical oddities to help me feel better about my own health. I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp. my family gets together every saturday. i am always looking for wildlife when i am outside. I earn money from my farm and YouTube channel.

content.text: I really enjoy listening to The Lumineers! What about you?
I've never heard of them, I will have to check them out! What kind of music do they play?
They have a folk-rock style. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to bake! I'm excited to try new recipes with my new George Foreman grill. I'm also the oldest of three boys.
That's awesome! I love to collect rare and unusual medical oddities. I also earn money from my farm and YouTube channel. My family gets together every Saturday.
That's so cool! I'm glad you have a hobby that you enjoy. I also like to spend time in the outdoors. I'm always looking for wildlife when I'm outside.
That's great! I'm sure you see some amazing things. I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
I agree! I'm excited to get to know you better.
